com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres

Interface Store

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemoryStore

    public interface Store
    Repository for socket.
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Socket socket)
      Adds a socket.
      Set<Socket> all()
      Retrieves an action with all the sockets.
      Socket findById(String id)
      Finds with the specified socket with the given id.
      Set<Socket> findByTag(String name)
      Finds the specified socket that has been tagged with the given tag name.
      void init(AppInside app)
      Invoked when the application starts.
      void remove(Socket socket)
      Removes a socket.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(AppInside app)
        Invoked when the application starts.

      • add

        void add(Socket socket)
        Adds a socket. Only opened socket can be added.

      • remove

        void remove(Socket socket)
        Removes a socket. Closed socket will be removed automatically.

      • all

        Set<Socket> all()
        Retrieves an action with all the sockets. Modification on the returned set doesn't affect the real one.

      • findById

        Socket findById(String id)
        Finds with the specified socket with the given id.

      • findByTag

        Set<Socket> findByTag(String name)
        Finds the specified socket that has been tagged with the given tag name.
